Package com.example.maritimemetrics.repository

Interface MaritimeMetricRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<MaritimeMetric,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MaritimeMetric,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<MaritimeMetric,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<MaritimeMetric,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<MaritimeMetric,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<MaritimeMetric>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<MaritimeMetric,Long>
@Repository public interface MaritimeMetricRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MaritimeMetric,Long>
Repository interface for accessing and manipulating maritime metric data.

    • findAllVesselCodes

      @Query("SELECT DISTINCT m.vesselCode FROM MaritimeMetric m") List<String> findAllVesselCodes()
      Retrieves all unique vessel codes from the maritime metrics data.
      Returns:
      a list of unique vessel codes

    • findSpeedDifferencesByVesselCode

      @Query("SELECT new com.example.maritimemetrics.dto.SpeedDifferenceDTO(m.latitude, m.longitude, m.speedDifference) FROM MaritimeMetric m WHERE m.vesselCode = :vesselCode AND m.isInvalid = false AND m.speedDifference IS NOT NULL") List<SpeedDifferenceDTO> findSpeedDifferencesByVesselCode(String vesselCode)
      Finds speed differences for a specific vessel code.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the code of the vessel
      Returns:
      a list of speed difference data transfer objects for the specified vessel

    • findMetricsByVesselCodeAndDatetimeBetween

      @Query("SELECT new com.example.maritimemetrics.dto.MetricSummaryDTO(m.power, m.fuelConsumption, m.actualSpeedOverground, m.proposedSpeedOverground, m.predictedFuelConsumption, m.speedDifference) FROM MaritimeMetric m WHERE m.vesselCode = :vesselCode AND m.isInvalid = false AND m.datetime BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate") List<MetricSummaryDTO> findMetricsByVesselCodeAndDatetimeBetween(String vesselCode, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Finds metrics for a specific vessel code within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the code of the vessel
      startDate - the start date for the date range
      endDate - the end date for the date range
      Returns:
      a list of metric summary data transfer objects for the specified vessel and date range

    • findSpeedOutliersByVesselCode

      @Query("SELECT m FROM MaritimeMetric m WHERE m.vesselCode = :vesselCode AND m.isInvalid = true AND ABS(m.actualSpeedOverground - m.proposedSpeedOverground) / m.proposedSpeedOverground > :speedThreshold") List<MaritimeMetric> findSpeedOutliersByVesselCode(String vesselCode, double speedThreshold)
      Finds speed outliers for a specific vessel based on a given threshold.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the code of the vessel
      speedThreshold - the threshold for identifying speed outliers
      Returns:
      a list of maritime metrics that are considered speed outliers

    • findFuelOutliersByVesselCode

      @Query("SELECT m FROM MaritimeMetric m WHERE m.vesselCode = :vesselCode AND m.isInvalid = true AND ABS(m.fuelConsumption - m.predictedFuelConsumption) / m.predictedFuelConsumption > :fuelThreshold") List<MaritimeMetric> findFuelOutliersByVesselCode(String vesselCode, double fuelThreshold)
      Finds fuel consumption outliers for a specific vessel based on a given threshold.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the code of the vessel
      fuelThreshold - the threshold for identifying fuel consumption outliers
      Returns:
      a list of maritime metrics that are considered fuel consumption outliers
